activities.title: Arrival in Paris
activities.description: Land at CDG Airport and take the RER B train to central Paris. Check into hotel and get settled.

activities.title: Lunch at Local Bistro
activities.description: Authentic French bistro experience with traditional dishes and local atmosphere.

activities.title: Eiffel Tower Visit
activities.location: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France
activities.description: Visit the iconic Eiffel Tower, take photos, and enjoy the sunset from Trocadéro.

activities.title: Louvre Museum
activities.description: Explore the world's largest art museum, including the Mona Lisa and Venus de Milo.

activities.title: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Relaxing boat cruise along the Seine with commentary on Paris landmarks.

activities.title: Dinner in Latin Quarter
activities.description: Traditional French dinner in the historic Latin Quarter with wine pairing.

activities.title: Montmartre & Sacré-Cœur
activities.description: Explore the artistic neighborhood of Montmartre and visit the beautiful Sacré-Cœur Basilica.

activities.title: Shopping on Champs-Élysées
activities.description: Browse luxury boutiques and department stores on Paris's most famous avenue.
